description:
When B.B.B. asks if aliens really exist, his grandpa says "Of course they do." Intrigued, B.B.B. takes his friends to hunt for an alien. On the way to the top of Bottom Hill, where Grandpa said he has seen aliens before, they spot alien-like footprints, strange writing, and a ray gun?! Will B.B.B. and his friends find an alien?!
Source: crunchyroll
